brand_identity.overall_vibe: A sleek, frictionless digital environment focused on clarity, focus, and ease of use.

primary: White (#FFFFFF) - Dominant background color used to create open, breathable spaces.
Dark Charcoal/Black (#1A1A1A) - Used for primary typography, logos, and high-emphasis calls to action.
secondary: Light Gray (#F8F9FA) - Used for secondary container backgrounds, form field fills, and subtle dividing borders.
color_palette.accents: Soft, muted pastels (pale blue, soft yellow, mint green) utilized strictly for functional categorization and status indicators, preventing visual clutter while maintaining a soft aesthetic.

typography.headings: High-contrast, bold to extra-bold weights used to establish a strong, clear visual hierarchy.
typography.body_text: Highly legible, regular weight, often utilizing dark gray instead of harsh pure black to reduce eye strain and maintain a refined look.

ui_components.layout: Grid-based with a generous and deliberate use of whitespace (negative space) to reduce cognitive load and draw focus to core interactive elements.
ui_components.shapes: Heavy reliance on soft, rounded corners (high border-radius) on all containers, buttons, and input fields to create a friendly, fluid, and less rigid interface.
ui_components.depth_and_elevation: Strategic use of soft, diffused drop shadows to separate overlapping elements (like floating tiles and central form cards) from flat backgrounds, creating a subtle 3D layering effect.
ui_components.buttons: Solid, high-contrast dark fills for primary actions with prominent rounding (pill-shaped or heavily rounded rectangles).

iconography_and_graphics.utility_icons: Minimalist, thin-line stroke icons used for navigation menus and input field hints.
iconography_and_graphics.decorative_elements: Floating, soft-edged square tiles featuring solid monochrome glyphs to add playful, dynamic visual interest without breaking the strict minimalist color theme.
iconography_and_graphics.background_textures: Mostly flat and solid, with occasional use of extremely faint, abstract geometric patterns (such as subtle network nodes/constellations) to implicitly communicate a technology and connectivity theme.
